text: Kuma da Mun so, da Mun ɗaukaka shi da su, kuma amma shi, ya nemi dawwama a cikin ƙasa, kuma ya bi son zuciyarsa. To, misalinsa kamar misalin kare ne, idan ka yi ɗauki a kansa ya yi lallage, ko kuwa ka bar shi sai ya yi lallage, wannan ne misalin mutane waɗanda suka ƙaryata game da ayoyinMu: Ka jeranta karatun labarun; tsammaninsu suna tunani
